ASIN B000NMI5I4 - 48 Count Box, size not specified, $28.80 + $12.00 shipping ($40.80)

ASIN B000Z9DB8Y - 4.4-Ounce Bag (Pack of 24), (not currently avail)
ASIN B000NLSP1C - 1.69 Ounce, (not currently avail)
ASIN B0015DGOLU - 56ounce Bag, (Easter edition, not currently avail)

Regardless of the multitude of listings, which are basically different in only three ways: size, price and seller, these are all the same item, so they should get the same review.

M&M Peanuts! Really, who doesn't know M&Ms with peanuts? Pretty, multi-colored candy shells with a layer of chocolate wrapped around a peanut; the Easter edition comes in pastels. Simplicity is good sometimes. Of course, the whole "melt in your mouth, not in your hand" thing, a lie. But a catchy lie.

I like the candies but stopped buying them when my son was a year old because he almost choked on one. Now that he's 19... well, it's time to return to my favorites! Ok, I could've returned earlier, I'm pretty sure he knows to chew his food now. M&Ms are a good old standard for the candy bowl! Hardly worth buying online, unfortunately, considering the shipping charges, but if you can find free shipping or get a deal on that, go for it.

- AnnaLovesBooks

Summary: Green Mountain Perfect Iced Tea Variety
Text: All 4 teas were good, but the sweetened ones were a little too sweet.  I would prefer all the flavors come unsweetened, then that way I can sweetened to my own taste.

Nature Valley bars are a natural source of energy to fuel healthy active lifestyles. One bar has 140 calories. That's not bad for a bar that satisfies our cravings for candy bars. We keep a box of Fruit & Nut bars on hand. When we get ready to leave on a road trip, we take some with us. That way we can travel further without having to stop along the way. Sometimes we grab a bar in the morning when we are in a hurry. They make a good breakfast.

Fruit & Nut Bars contain almonds, raisins, peanuts, and cranberries.

In 1975, Nature Valley created the granola bar category. Since then Nature Valley has continued to set the standard for granola bars.

Now it is possible to buy Nature Valley granola bars in all sorts of flavors, such as Apple Crisp, Strawberry Yogurt, Vanilla Yogurt, Blueberry Yogurt, Mixed Berry, Banana Nut, Oats and Honey, Cinnamon, Maple Brown Sugar, Roasted Almond, and Peanut Butter. We started with Fruit & Nut bars, and so far we have not managed to buy anything else. I suppose we should try other kinds, but Fruit & Nut bars are too good.

I hope you found this review helpful.

This product may well be a backpacker's delight, but it probably will be a disappointment to a home cook.The product no doubt will hold its own in comparison with other dried, light-weight products for the hiker's food bag. But the package directions (which are very small print and hard to read)can tip off a home cook that the manufacturer makes enough suggestions about to improve the mouth feel and taste of the product that the home cook realizes that for roughly the same amount of work and roughly the same expense of materials and utilities, one can make a much more tasty green chili stew at home.  Understand, please, that this is not a bad product if you want backpack trail food.  But if you have a stove and refrigerator and the usual household commodities potatoes, onions, chilis, spices) on hand, your family almost certainly will prefer chili stew made from scratch, and it will take about the same time and effort.

Summary: Better than WIlton fondant, but not the best.
Text:
Satin Ice is more plyable and better tasting (for fondant0 than the Wilton boxed fondant at Michael's and WalMart. If you need colors, they are vibrant and strong--their blank and read are the best.
While I have used Satin Ice many times, I will say that whatever fondant is used and marketed as the "Duff" brand (from Ace of Cakes) is a MUCH better product than even Satin Ice. You can re-rool and stretch it to fit like nothing I have ever seen. It really is the easiest fondant I have ever worked with--worth waiting for the 40% off coupons from the large chain craft store and buying the Duff brand.
You can find Satin Ice elsewhere on the Internet cheaper than here, but at least you know Amazon is pretty dependable.

This has been my favorite salsa for years. I do not care for thick and chunky varieties. This is more like fresh homemade salsa. I have always ordered it direct for the maker and have always recieved excellent service!!

I'm using vinegar to make multi-purpose cleaning solutions for around the house. Back to basics, REAL SIMPLE solutions, less chemicals and cheaper to make and use than store bought.  Just remembering and using The Grannies' ideas from a simpler time.

Summary: Good Saffron at a budget that you can afford.
Text: This saffron quality was really good. And it comes in affordable price. 5g is not so small. Saffron is really light weight stuff like cotton. So 5 g is really a lot.

I bought these recently as a Friday special for a great price.  These came quickly and I have one bag open and the others hidden so I don't eat them all.  These are huge bags and the candy is nice and fresh.  Wish the peanut butter ones would come in bags like these and sold thru Amazon, not another seller who charges shipping.  Thanks for the good sale on these.

You can read all the reviews for coconut oil, so there's no need to say it again, but this product has improved my life and the lives of my pets many times, many ways. I have tried several brands, and the Nutiva brand is my favorite for flavor, cost and effectivness.  I love it!  I would recommend this product for everyone, as it offers benefits for every type of problem, and for improvements in energy levels, weight loss, better skin and hair, fighting infections....the list is endless. Bravo Nutiva for offering a product that is reasonably priced of the highest quality, and bravo Amazon for offering this superior product at such a good price point.
I use this product as a skin oil. I don't like the taste of coconuts so the smell was a bit to overcome initially (more potent than previous brand I used); but I got used to it

Summary: The most delicious tuna on Earth.
Text:
I used to eat a ton of tuna.
I'm 37 years old...do any of you remember what tuna was like when we were little?
It was actually chunky and looked like something that came from a living creature?
Then somewhere along the line "chunk" tuna literally started looking like cat food.
You'd open the can to drain the water and half the tuna would spill out with the water.
It's revolting.
Then upon further research (Google LOL)..... I found out that the majority of tuna makers started using a variety of Tuna called "Skip Jack".
They're still tuna but much smaller and less expensive.
That's why tuna looks like cat food nowadays.
If you want the good stuff, you have to get the solid chunk tuna.
It's more expensive but it's worth it.
Then one fine day I saw the Bumblebee Thai and figured it would taste like spicy cat food.
Man was I WRONG!!!
I went from a tuna lover to a tuna hater and back again.
This tuna is the ultimate treat.
It's spicy but not overly hot.
It's simply delicious in salad.
It's probably the only tuna I can literally eat right out of the can.
I cannot rave enough about this particular brand of tuna.
Spicy
Delicious
A home run for Bumblebee.
Highly recommended.

Summary: PLEASE RESEARCH BEFORE GIVING TO YOUR DOG!
Text:
Read the stories online....dogs have died from Greenies. I gave my 50lb pound dog Greenies for the first time 2 weeks ago, and she became very very sick for more than a week. She was vomiting and having potty issues the entire time. These cause blockages and do not allow the dog to fully digest. I can't believe these are still on the market.

From one loving pet owner to another - DO YOUR RESEARCH BEFORE GIVING YOUR DOGS GREENIES! TRUST ME.

Summary: The best flavor... not too sweet
Text: My twins love apples and carrots, so this was an easy win.  Also, much less sweet than all the other flavors (also try Plum Baby's carrot apple). Great for car & stroller snacks. They've been slurping these down since they were 12 months.
I don't know what's in the Gatorade, but for some reason it helps with depression.  My family suffered a major tragedy last year and this has kept the depressed person buoyed up.  Go figure.

I dont' know why but they don't work with my coffee makers. Clear water comes out and is nasty. I know LAvazza makes great coffee but not these pods. they don't work.

too bad.

Summary: I base entire meals around getting to use this honey mustard
Text:
This sauce is mild on the scale of hotness when it comes to condiments, but it is extremely flavorful. I like it best on fried chicken. The first time I ever tried this sauce was actually at Ike's Crab Cakes on the Ocean City boardwalk in Ocean City, NJ--and I think I'd been craving it, since. It adds so much to a meal that I would have no qualms about shoving it into my coat pocket and taking it with me to restaurants.

It's sweet like honey mustard, but not so much that it overpowers the peppers. It sounds almost exotic to people who've never tried it when you describe it to them, but the ones I've met have unanimously agreed that they find this sauce agreeable. :)

Seriously, try it--if only to satisfy your curiousity. This makes a great gift for anyone who is a fan of Dave's.

This product arrived quickly.  I was very pleased with the price as I have been paying much more at Petco for pill pockets. My dog has to take two pills daily and won't even take them in peanut butter anymore. She loves the pill pockets!

Summary: Very good, but not exactly close to the original.
Text:
While I enjoy the taste of Dr. Zevia for itself, the DH doesn't enjoy it at all. (He was really hoping for something closer to the original.) That and the fact that it is only available in cans is the reason that I'm giving it 3 stars.

Neither of us thought that it has an unpleasant aftertaste, and it's not over-carbonated. (Some sodas are so fizzy that it feels like you're drinking flavored foam.) However, the reddish coloring stains like the blazes. A few drops got on a light green table cloth, and even a stain stick didn't get it out. Ugh. Between the aluminum cans, the staining and the fact that I'm the only one who likes the taste, I probably won't be buying this often, if at all.

Summary: I Like Them But Be Wary
Text: These are very nice, though not as peachy a flavor as I would have liked.  Don't eat more than 4 or you will be living in the bathroom, if you get my drift.

Summary: African Red Tea Rooibos Face Cream
Text: I purchased this cream after struggling with eczema in my face (around eyes,cheeks,chin)and on my neck for more then 6 months. I tried lots of other different creams - Eucerin, Cetaphil, Aquaphor, baby lotions, even some corticoids. Nothing helped. Sometimes it got better after corticoids the eczema even disappeared. But only for like 3 days and then appeared again. Then I tried Aubrey Organics Rosa Mosqueta Rose Hip Moisturizing Cream. It got much better. The affected areas were nicely moisturized after using this cream. But again, it didn't disappeared. Then I tried the African Red Tea Rooibos Face Cream. After one week of using it, the eczema was much much better. The affected areas were not dry, not red, not itchy. I used it like 5 or 6 times per day (just on the areas that were bothering me). After not even 2 weeks of using it, the eczema was completely gone! Only one tiny spot on my chin remained. But I got rid of it soon too. I'm still using it. Just 2 times per day (morning, evening) and I'm fine. I've been using this cream for 2,5 months. I really recommend it.

Summary: So thin and small, my little dog ate them in 10 minutes
Text: I have ordered these exact bully sticks in the past. The quality has gone from an A to an F. They are so very thin that they don't last long at all. I contacted the company and they offered me a 15% discount. What a joke. I asked them about quality control, apparently they have none. I will never order from this company again. So totally disappointed!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Mori-Nu Tofu, Lite, Silken, Firm, 12.3-Ounce Boxes (Pack of 12)

2 or 3 packages in one of the cases were damaged and had leaked. The whole case was replaced at no cost. So we actually got more than that case. We were pleased with the service.

First-coffee flavor is very subjective. So you should know something about our tastes.
I use sugar, no cream, my wife drings it black, no sugar. My wife likes Folger Simply Smooth, but I find the flavor lacking. I like Eight O Clock regular, she finds it okay. We recently tried Dunkin Donuts coffee, and like it. Neither of us like Starbucks coffee. Bitter taste.

Key Points. We use reverse osmosis water, and just purchased a new Michael Graves coffeemaker. This coffeemaker was recommended by Consumer Reports, is not expensive, and we like it. I mention that because we have noticed that as the coffeemaker ages, the coffee loses flavor. I guess the coils don't get as hot. Also, we always shut the coffeemaker off immediately. Leaving it on, quickly ruins the coffee taste.

On the Gevalia Chocolate, the aroma is wonderful, both on opening and during the brewing process. Creates a nice atmosphere.

The first day, we used 7 tablespoons of coffee to 48 ounces of water. We found the coffee too full bodied for our tastes. The next day we used only 6 tablespoons of coffee to 48 ounces of water. Though this would seem to make a weak brew, it was very smooth and with a nice flavor. Not a real chocolate taste, but a pleasant flavor. To summarize. We consider this a nice coffee to give as a gift, and to brew when guests are in the house. We will buy it occasionally, but it will not be our primary coffee. Hope this review helps someone.

This coffee was about the worst coffee I have ever had. It left a bitter taste in my mouth, and had no smoothness.  After reading the description(before ordering) it sounded wonderful. Whoever wrote it should get a reward for fiction.

I'm a bit picky when it comes to tea but was still excited about trying out the Twinings Earl Grey from my new Bosch Tassimo brewbot.  I was absolutely NOT disappointed.  I have enjoyed several cups since Christmas and it's simply perfect each time.  No over-steeped taste. Never watery. I recently discovered Coffee-Mate Honey Vanilla Cream, which has been the perfect touch to take me back to teatime in London.

Summary: Wonderful Sugar Free Flavoring - Highly Recommended!
Text:
The Kahlua Flavor is one of my favorite DaVinci Sugar Free Flavored Syrup types. This was a great find for me since I am a Type 2 diabetic and really have an overpowering sweet tooth.

We have tried quite a few of the different brands on the market, but have settled back to DaVinci since the flavors are good and they are sweetened with Splenda. Several of the other brands use Sorbitol (which my wife is slightly allergic to) or Maltitol (which causes me "gastric distress" in large quantities).

The real test for anything sugar free is if my kids will use it, and they all like the flavor enough to go out of their way for it. We have used this in coffee and in baking with great results.

Highly Recommended!

Peter Pan peanut butter is my favorite, and with Subscribe and Save it ends up costing about $1 a jar less than it does at the local "big box" store.

Since peanut butter is shelf stable and can last for a couple of years unopened in your pantry, this is a good item to stock up on.

I've tried stevia from other manufacturers, but always come back to SweetLeaf.  There is just no comparison.  It's easy to use in all recipes that call for sugar or other sweeteners.  It's also better for you than sugar and Splenda.  No after taste. I use the liquid Stevia in beverages.  It only takes a drop or two, depending on your taste. So if your looking for a calorie free sweetener you simply must try SweetLeaf Stevia first.  Don't waste your money on anything else.  It's the BEST.

Damn good product. My cats are very pickie and will only eat certain foods which changes frequently. But not with this product. They love it. I only wish when I order from Amazon I could get all my products from one source. I get the greenies from one source then I also order pill pockets made by the same manufacturer which I get from several other sources. I end up getting a number of deliveries on different days. But, it's cheaper than stores like Petsmart and Petco., whc
I really wanted to like this, but I couldn't stomache it whatsoever.  It literally went down the drain, like my money.

I'm not an iced coffe drinker, but I thought I would give this a shot. The whole can was 100 cals. It did taste mildly of coffee & milk, but I felt it could've been a bit sweeter. The drink was thin, not lush. It was ok as a sample, but i wouldn't purchase.

I have tried many "bars" and based on nutritional value vs taste, I think these top them all.  Also, no ingredients you can't pronounce or that are harmful or artificial. You must love nuts with these bars...which I do!

I bought these for my hubby because he loves licorice. These tasty twists also have some nutritional value too, BOUNUS! My hubby absolutely Loved them! I very much recommned Newman's Own Organics Pomegranate Licorice Twists.

Love to make espresso, and have had many types, but this was horrid.  amazon doesn't return grocery items, so i threw all 4 cans away after the first try.  I will have to try grocery products at the store and THEN buy them in the future on amazon...yikes this stuff is bad.

I really tried to get my dog to eat some of the food from the bag that I was sent to review. I offered it to her several times. I even resorted to trying to wrap it in bits of ham the way that we administer pills to her. She is very picky and sometimes once you can get her to at least taste something she comes around and decide she likes it.

In this case, it didn't work out. She ate the ham and spat out the dog food. After repeating this on several different occasions I took the hint and quit trying to get her to eat the food. For whatever reason, she's just not going for this one. It's not the healthiest of dog foods, anyway, so I'm not planning to give it another shot or try another flavor any time soon.

This product used to be made in Brazil and was of a higher quality.  My dog would chew these rawhide rolls for several days.  The bone is now made in China and lasts her less than an hour.  I will not purchase this product again.

Summary: Candy is great but packaging had a lot to be desired.
Text: Love Chick O Sticks and ordered three boxes as Christmas gifts.  But unfortunately they were not packaged properly and most of the sticks were broken in two to three places.

I read the reviews and was hopeful for this product.  I am very pleased with this tea.  I have ordered Jasmine tea from many sources and paid top dollar at times.  I adore this type of tea and wanted a medium range quality that I could have for all day long enjoyment.  I am so happy I bought this and would very much recommend for anyone looking for an optimum value tea.  The quality is good and the jasmine is plentiful.  With 2 lbs for what I was getting 6 oz for you just can't beat it. I will be looking to this source for some of my other tea/coffee purchases in the future.
I can't wait to try some of this coffee because until now the breakfast blend I think is the best but Im going to try some more.

Summary: good cereal..but what about the quantity..??
Text: The whole 4 cereal boxes costs just $11..what an amazing buy..Thats what I thought when i bought it..but when it came in i found the 4 boxes each containing 256 grams in them..which makes them just as expensive as they are in the store or more..good cereal..need not buy it from amazon for this price..
This is the best jerky I've ever eaten and makes a great snack for travel.

Summary: A Great change from other chips -- Tasty and Healthy
Text:
Like another reviewer, I've had sweet potato fries at a restaurant and thought they were great. My boss says that sweet potatoes are actually better then regular ones for people trying to watch their sugar levels.

These chips taste great, with just the right amount of saltiness and sweetness, yet have a small amount of sodium (which is good). They don't seem greasy either.

So far I've had them plain, but I'm sure they'd totally rock with some Pineapple Peach salsa (my favorite salsa from Super Target grocery stores :-) .

I am so thankful Amazon was able to get this cocoa for me. They don't care this Nestle Product in any sotre from Michigan to Florida.

I love 3 tablespoons in my coffee every morning.

Thanks Nestle

Summary: Amazon's Subscribe & Save program makes this a sweet deal
Text:
My wife likes to start her day with a taste of chocolate, so when Amazon's Subscribe & Save program began offering Chocolate Cheerios at a competitive price we placed an order. The first shipment arrived with an added surprise - each box has a Spongebob Squarepants toy inside! Our sons (ages 8 and 7) happily prepare their mother's morning bowl of cereal, knowing each serving gets them one step closer to completing the 8-piece collection.

Of course, my wife would eat Chocolate Cheerios with or without the toy. She eats the cereal with 2% milk and a cup of black coffee because, really, you don't need cream or sugar when you're eating a bowl of chocolate cereal.

Getting to the basics: the cereal was tightly packaged with no damage; the expiration date extends at least 12 months out, so there's no mad dash to consume six boxes at once; and the price is competitive with the supermarkets we regularly patronize. The added convenience of the cereal arriving at our doorstep rather than hauling it home in shopping bags is a bonus.

Personally, I don't touch the stuff. I'm more of a Post Raisin Bran Cereal kind of guy. And, yes, of course, we buy that through Amazon's Subscribe & Save program as well.

Rating: Five stars
Still in process of narrowing down my personal preferences. Medium strong which is a good thing, but I get an aftertaste that I'm not crazy about - might be me.

Added 2 T spoons in my smoothie plus a frozen banana, it was great. You can also add water or oil and make your own peanut butter. Great on bread or crackers. Love peanut butter and by using this I miss alot of calories.
Plus this vendor was fast on delivery.

Summary: Amazing strength at such a small size
Text:
I had to pull an all-nighter but I hate the huge cans of energy drinks (sometimes they make me go to sleep). I saw the commercial for this product on tv and decided to try it out. The berry flavor's not too bad-it tastes like liquified smarties. I also liked the fact that it promises that you won't crash (I had several classes and work the following day) and that it's only 4 calories. The no-refrigeration is also handy when you only want to drink half of the bottle.

I drank a whole bottle after deciding that half wouldn't give me enough juice to stay up. I did start feeling it after a couple of minutes and I actually lasted for about 8 more hours before I started feeling drowsy. There was no crash and I didn't feel any bad effects. I definitely recommend this to anyone and plan on using it again.

The consistency of the grain free chicken, turkey, lamb and fish formula was like
baby poop. There was so much water in this cat food that two cats went through a
full case in a short time. I can put the water in the cat food. It is misleading
and a poor value for the manufacturer to water down a product, call it a 13 oz can
and provide nothing like I have come to know and expect from other brands the same
size.
These are great. If I could buy them local I would not have been so SHOCKED that the shipping fees for a case of these were 50% of what I paid for the item. Ridiculous.

Summary: Very light taste, you have to acquire a taste for this Crystal Light
Text: When I took my first sip of Crystal Light Moctails Mojito I thought it tasted like dirty dishwater.  The taste is very light, almost like flavored water.  However, the more I drank of it the more I liked it.  Now I love it.  It is a very pale yellow, and unlike other flavors of Crystal Light, this one is not very sweet.  I don't think I'll be getting this again, but it was nice to try.  I don't necessarily recommend it, but I don't recommend against it, either.

Summary: Good ingredients, cat likes it, less expensive than Wellness
Text: Essentially that's it. Good ingredients, cat likes it, less expensive than Wellness at about $1.60 a can. Amazon delivered the case within a week (free shipping), so keep that in mind when ordering.  Other orders of this cat food have included dented cans, but all of the cans in this order were fine.  Hence 5 stars.

There's something wonky with the product description.  It's a single bone, not "3 slices per bag."  And apparently there's no uniformity with this product.  Another reviewer said their bone was small, 4 inches.  The bone I got was HUGE, way too big for my dog.  I gave it to my friend's mastiff who enjoyed it but that's how big this bone was.  If you're a fan of roulette, proceed.

I feel really bad writing this review since I am a big fan of the Newman's Own brand for human food. Their salad dressings are amazing. However, my cat would not eat this product. I purchased the beef flavor because she loves her beef flavored cat treats. I give her organic dry food most of the time, but after talking to some other cat owners, they informed me that I should be mixing some wet food into her diet because wild cats get most of their moisture from their food in nature and don't drink a lot of water. I thought it couldn't hurt to give this to the cat as a treat a couple times a week, but she won't even touch it. I tried mixing her regular dry food into it to give it some texture, and she just ate the dry food around it. I am not sure if this is just a textual preference for my cat or if it is this particular cat food.

I have been feeding this food to my dog for about 5 months. He loves it and it seems to agree very well with him. He is a very small and energetic Miniature Schnauzer.  I don't know about the scientific claims, but my dogs health, energy, teeth and coat are all positive.

My cat has gingivitis, and he's only 2. My vet prescribed fancy expensive food that you can only get from a vet. I did some research, and this stuff is made by the same company, with a nearly identical ingredients list. While i was mixing in his old food with this stuff to acclimate him, he'd pick out the new food until he ate it all, leaving behind his purina!
As far as helping his gingivitis, it's helped a little. The plaque has gone down considerably, but the gumline is still reddish. He really loves this stuff, so I'll probably buy this again.
Purchased for my wife who very much enjoys the blend.  The price is right which makes it extra speacial.

I received this product as part of the Amazon Vine Program

This Lipton to go decard tea is good and is refreshing.

I wished it had less ingredients but overall is a better
alternative to soda pop. And less calories.
Low calorie, its true. Try other flavors not Salt & Vinegar.  Wish I could return them, but we ate 2.  Or at least tried to, yuck!

Summary: Reeks of ammonium when you cook it...
Text:
I was hesitant at buying these shiitake mushrooms at first knowing that they were from china.
I reasoned with myself that since they were organic that they had to be okay.

When i fry them in oil or butter there is such a horrible chemical smell, like ammonium, that it is unbearable to eat, no matter how you try and disguise the flavor, the mushrooms taste like they were preserved in ammonium. When i put them in a soup base, that same horrid chemical aroma is still there.

I was so excited to get my box of Fog Chaser. I had been paying nearly $40 for Starbucks at a wholesale club and only for 40 cups. I had cut myself to one cup per day! Then my friend shared this link and I thought "Why not!" It arrived quickly, and smelled heavenly. I like dark, strong coffee, and I could tell by the smell it would fit the bill. The real test is in making it. I brewed it this morning--no grounds in my coffee, and no residue left in my cup. Wondered if the soft filter cup at the bottom would work, and it does. How great is that???? It doesn't taste like instant coffee either, which some imitations do. 80 cups for $33 is an awesome deal...that is around $0.42 a cup. If you buy the little boxes at WalMart you only get 18 for $10..which is around $0.61 per cup...you save $0.19 per cup, which doesn't sound like a lot, but you would spend $50 buying as much at WalMart to get 80 K cups. So you are saving $17. I love it!!! Order yours today, you won't be disappointed.

Summary: Tastes better in coffee than sugar
Text:
We LOVE this product. My husband and I both use this in our coffee every day and love it. There is no yucky artificial sweetener taste and it is good for your teeth. Stevia tasted so bad in coffee, so we were hesitant to buy anything else for a while, but I am so happy we tried this. I think we have used ideal packets for about a year now and have gone through many boxes.

I'm happy to find it here, but the 700 ct package was a much better deal. I hope they start carrying it again.
The product was great, fresh and arrived on time. The only thing that I can say I was disappointed in was after eating 24 bags of cotton candy, not one bag had the yellow flavor.
Great for instant coffee and perfect for mornings where you don't have time to add cream and sugar. Cheaper than most k-cups too. They do lack the "ummph" of regular k-cups though.

Summary: Perfect for puppy training class!! She loves it!!
Text:
My 8 month old golden retriever is surprisingly very picky about food. Our training class uses positive reinforcement with treats and lots of them. The last class, I ran out of hot dogs, and my puppy decided she didn't like bologna, or cheese anymore (which was all I had left) and was over it! She lost interest in training for the day after that.
I got home and decided to look for a really enticing treat that she will love and I found these on Amazon and for a great price too! She LOVES it and it's small enough and plentiful enough that a bag should last me at least a few weeks or longer of training.

Summary: Caution, Trans Fat is in it!
Text:
It has Partially Hydrogenated Soybean Oil - that's trans fat.

I've been looking for a powder drink sweetened with Splenda, but without trans fat. Check some of their other flavors though, not all of them have trans fat.

I've tasted the best of the "real things," and they were wonderful and dreadfully high in fat, carbs, and calories; that includes dressings, dips, and sauces.  Yes, I've added up what goes into a salad, and those oil and fat content calories soar!  If you expect a fat-free substitute for most anything to be a close equivalent, forget it; you'll have to do with eating the tiniest bits of food to lose weight.  If you expect a zero-calorie substitute to taste the same, ditto.  However, the key here is to find the best of the WF products for you.  I can't do the Peanut Spread (and I'm addicted to Peanut Butter), but most of the other products I can manage.  Some of the dressings are really good, especially the Balsamic.  Loving sweets, I keep handy an assortment of chocolate sauce and dip, caramel sauce, pancake syrup, and I've recently "discovered" the blueberry pancake syrup.  The trick is not to use too much because, yes, there is an aftertaste, but if you use the right amount, it's a darn good substitute.  AND...the calories...the carbs...the fat...don't add up!!

My husband loves sweet tea and he is the pickiest person in the word when it comes to food. He actually loves this sweet tea. Having been born and raised in the south, he likes it really sweet and though I didn't think this was as sweet as some I have had, it has a great smooth flavor.
This chocolate is wonderful! I prefer the Belagio Sipping Chocolate, but for people who aren't as keen on dark, rich chocolate, this mix is great!

I first bought this product several months ago when searching for a "natural" gum without artificial ingredients. I just received a new shipment of the gum in February 2012, and they've changed the name of the product from Richochet to Xyla - but the name is not all that has changed. The ingredients are completely different, and it now contains titanium dioxide and artificial flavors. I am really disappointed that the company chose to change the formulation - why mess with a good thing!! The Amazon website doesn't reflect the new ingredient listing - it is still showing the old one.

I will be returning the new recipe!

My mom, who has always believed that breakfast is the most important meal of the day, approved of this product for her kids as a good substitute, ever since it first came out. In recent years, she's lost a lot of weight, and has become a very picky eater. When she refuses to eat what's on hand, she's given a glass of this - she also likes it at nighttime. Strawberry is her favorite, and has become nearly impossible to find, except in some variety packs (why??). I'm thrilled and grateful that Amazon carries it, and hope it continues to do so - I'll definitely continue to buy it!

This is the second time I've ordered this product and I plan to order these often.  They work perfectly and I am able to use my favorite speciality coffees especially when I run out of the prefilled K-cups sold at retail stores.

We just recently added a corgi to our family, and I started researching different types of wet and dry foods for our pup. After trying different raw diets, we eventually settled on the Weruva brand of dog food. Our local pet store recommended it to us, and the girl working actually opened up a can and started eating it! It's processed in Thailand, and before that scares anybody, you have to realize that the food processing laws in Thailand are MUCH more strict than in America (read it up online!). They are not allowed to process by-product in their pet food, or use filler product. Weruva definitely does not have any of that--you can actually eat the dog food and it'll taste just like dinner.

Our boy has a sensitive stomach and he's a very picky eater. The first night we got him the regular Chicken with Gravy he ate that whole can up. He loved it, and when we tried feeding him anything different he refused. Then we ordered him the Kobe Master flavor and it quickly became one of his favorites. I'd definitely recommend this brand, especially coming from a very concerned dog owner. I won't feed my dog anything else.

These are so good, like others said they have the right balance of sweet and sour they are soft and very chewy. The bags are HUGE about 5 pounds each. The fruity aroma can fill up a whole room. Ordered yesterday they came today (Nov5). Great product and pro packaged.

I used to purchase Earth's Best and Plum Organics brand prunes until they were both unavailable one day.  I ordered these O Organics prunes instead to try them out.  They are fantastic!  I'm a convert.  These are much thicker in texture than the other prunes, so it's like getting more prunes for the volume.  My baby loves these.
I love the flavor and the sleek look of the can. I try not to drink soda and this was a good alternative. I would definitely recommend.

I rate this 4 stars only because the chocolate flavor isn't as flavorful as it could be.  The chocolate could be more distinct.  That said, the PB2 product is wonderful.  The regular PB2 peanut butter is definitely a 5 star treat.  Quick and easy to mix and it blends well without clumping or lumping.  I've been using this product for the two years I've been on Weight Watchers and I don't miss regular peanut butter at all.
My son LOVES these cookies! they are the first yummy soft gluten free cookie we have found. You would never know they were gluten free, they taste that good!!

Summary: My Dog LOVES This Meaty Sirloin Treat!
Text: My dachsund just gobbles this up right away, he LOVES LOVES LOVES this grilled sirloin!  I mixed it with it Beneful, so as not to switch dogfoods on him right away and upset his small stomach, and he always picks through and nom nom noms the sirloin meaty pieces straight away before eating the rest of the dry food later, thats how much he loves Chef Michael's Grilled Sirloin Dog Food.  Dobey is pretty picky, too.  Often his food sits around all day and he only eats as he gets hungry, but now the second it hits the bowl, he swoops in for the kills and just makes light of CM dog food, then takes his time as usual with the rest of his food, lol.  Plus this is much healthier than his other dog foods we've been through (Meijer Dog Brand and Purina Beneful), so even though it is more expensive, it seems the cost is definitly worth it.  My dog insists I continue with this brand, lol.  He absolutly salivates now and stands by his bowl when it's empty, which he has NEVER done before.  He doesn't beg for people food nearly as much (still for meat, yes, but not caring as much for anything else), and when I say my dog begs, he has very good manners which involve just sitting and watching me eat lol.  He couldn't care less unless it's meat.  This new dried food just OWNS everything else he's ever had.  Highly recommended, the price might be higher but it's also healthier for your dog baby and he will just love and appreciate you and the food so much more!  I've never seen my little guy so active as he's been since eating this lately, I can't get him to come in from outside, and he's such an indoor dog, so that's a good thing, too!  5 stars all the way for me!  Just wish it was a little cheaper.

Summary: Great tea but tea bags may be good enough...
Text: PG Tips is a great tea from England, strong a full of flavour.  One can easily find tea bags in some up-scale supermarkets but those of us who like to use loose tea have trouble finding this product.  Upon opening the box, I was surprised to find how fine the loose tea is ground.  It is probably the same product that goes into the tea bags which, I guess, shouldn't have surprised me.  Not all infusers will work well this this product, a fine mesh size is necessary if one is to avoid a lot of leaf fragments in their drink.  I can usually get two decent mug-fulls from two teaspoons of loose tea, making a second cup with the PG Tips did not produce as nearly as robust drink as the first steeping.  I put this down to the fineness of the tea leaves and there being not much left in them for a second cup.  To be honest, a second steeping of PG Tip produced a drink comparable to the standard Lipton tea first steep but when one is expecting the robust flavour of PG Tips, it proves somewhat unsatisfying.  Will I buy the loose leaf version of this tea again?  I'm not sure at this point.  Tea bags are convenient and there is no shipping charge for me to get them but I do like loose leaf tea.  We shall see.

For the 3 yrs I've owned an espresso machine, I've never had a pump for my syrups... Thought I'd give it a try and I am in love!! It never drips, like a lot of pumps do. And if you want to lock it in the down position after each use just simply twist it on your last down pump. It's fantastic!! I would definitely order this again, especially for the price! No mess with the sticky syrup is key!

Our vet uses these, often broken into smaller pieces. As long as you don't let them dry out, they break easily. We break them into halves for our two dogs who LOVE them.
Just don't pay vet prices!

Summary: Wolfgang Puck Coffee, Chef's Reserve, Medium Roast, 18-Count Pods (Pack of 3)
Text: I order this Subscribe & Save making it much cheaper than Senseo Med. Roast I used to order. Wolfgang Puck Coffee, Chef's Reserve, Medium Roast, 18-Count Pods (Pack of 3) is always a great cup of coffee. You will not be disappointed. My wife and I love this coffee and she informed me not to bother ordering the Senseo Medium Roast anymore!

I really like to mix things up with k-cups and rarely buy 50-ct boxes of a single flavor. Exception to the rule would be for dark, bold coffees such as French roasts, which I really enjoy. So when Wolfgang Puck's French roast turned up on Amazon's deal of the week, even though I have never tried before, now I have 48 units.

It's fairly non-descript for a French roast. Decent aroma, but taste is muted compared to, for example, a Diedrich French roast. I don't hate or even dislike it, it's 'okay', and for the price I paid, is acceptable without complaint. It may make an acceptable guest coffee for those wanting something a little bolder without being over the top rich.

I'd call it mildly bold, average, and I won't be going out of my way to keep it on hand.

I purchased GOLEAN Crunch with Turtle Rolls and Power Bars using a 20% off coupon on total purchase of $50 or more.  It was a great deal.  The cereal is delicious and was delivered in excellent shape.  No problems with the product being old or having a short expiration date.

This is as fine a bisque as you can find in a can.  I punched it up with a little wine, and diced fresh lobster meat. I ordered a case and have already used at for two dinner parties.  All of the guests were impressed and thought it was made from scratch.  If you really like a bold-tasting traditional type bisque, you'll like this brand.  I would not hesitate to buy it again.

A bit too sweet for me (I prefer Mother's mini chocolate chip cookies), but they're my girlfriend's favorite. And since I just proposed a month ago & she said 'yes', I gotta learn to compromise, right? --I bought both brands

This soda rocks. A welcome change from Pepsi colas and Coke Colas of the world. It taste sweet and great. They got the orange color right on the nose. Don't drink too much of this stuff or it will turn your lips and your teeth orange. Overall a great change from Pepsi and Coke Cola with a great taste. I give this soda a 10 out of 10.

Now, here's a solid, great product.

These were delicious. I felt "addicted" during the two days or so that the box lasted.

They're perfect. The cereal pieces are small and very crunchy; they're very lightly sweetened; they're fun and satisfying to eat. Unfortunately, any other information you're seeking will have to come off the box.

I only "fear" that some people insistent upon a sweet taste will add sugar to this. Maybe that's my only warning to those with dietary restrictions, those in charge of those with them, or parents with kids.

Kudos to Quaker, though. I say this product couldn't have been better.

Gunpowder tea is green tea, most of which comes from a city named Pingshui in the Eastern Chinese province of Zhejiang, south of the Yangtse River Delta, where it has been cultivated for centuries and is known as the "green pearl" of tea. Pingshui tea market records date as far back as the Tang Dynasty (AD 618 - 907). The area's gunpowder tea was an important tribute traditionally given to the Chinese emperors; and with the growing trade volume between China and the West it also acquired an increasing number of lovers in Europe. Particularly during the second half of the 19th century, when gunpowder tea export reached its peak, its price on the London market was second only to then-popular Wu Yi Oolong (also from China). Even today, Zhejiang Province still proudly calls itself "home of silk and tea" for its two primary natural products.

The name "gunpowder" derives from the tea's elaborate method of processing, which traditionally lasts several hours and during which the tea leaves are withered, steamed or stir-fried and individually rolled into small pellets. Early foreign traders mistook these pellets for gunpowder or gunshot.

Gunpowder tea has a delicate aroma with a slightly smokey note. It should *always* be enjoyed without milk or cream.

Summary: Good DIY Pearl for Bubble Tea
Text:
I've been looking for a pearl that doesn't turn out horrible at home. These were not the best I've had, but not the worst by far. They turned out to have a good texture- not super chewy/ not hard and pealing. They cooked for only about 17 minutes and were fine. They tasted much better than the minute pearls and not as slow as some other brands.

The bag is HUGE! I wasn't sure what to expect, but these should last us for some time. If you can't find the large pearls locally and need to order online these have a lot of bang for your buck. When I calculated the size to shipping ratio for my area it was equal to purchasing the smaller box at the store (if I could ever find them). Not a mind-blowing amazingly delicious pearl (what tapioca pearl is though), but they hit the spot and I don't regret buying the larger package.

Subject says it all, the mango is delicious but there's just so much sugar added it's too much.
34grams per serving means 51grams per bag, which is insane.

Summary: Best Chocolate I've had in a long time!
Text:
I don't know what product the other review is referring to, but this DOES have sugar, not malitol.

I think this has the perfect balance of orange oil in it, not too strong, not too bland. The regular 70% from this brand and the mint flavor are good too, but this is my favorite.

And no soy lecithin either!
Best tasting all vegetable  soup on the market. Vegetables are crisp and fresh tasting.

Summary: Very Good & Yummy - Kids Love It
Text: It's not something I would normally purchase.  Interstingly, the fruit leathers were gone in short order!  My three boys loved them.  We like the Apricot flavor, but some younger children may prefer the fruitier flavors.

I've had these marshmallow treats before and they were awesome.  That is why I gave the product four stars.  But when I got them from Amazon.com, most of the treats were very hard.  My siblings and I were knawing on them.  I know that they are supposed to be crispy, but not that crispy.
They are a wonderful idea, however mine were very crushed and stale :( still edible but I was a bit dissapointed in the quality.

I am a peanut butter addict and I absolutely love using this in my daily protein shakes. Flavor is delicious and it is more than half the calories and fat. What more can you ask for?! Awesome healthier alternative. I have not tried it in a sandwhich yet though.

Summary: Tastes good but a bit too sweet for me.
Text: This tea had a refreshing, fruity flavor that was really delicious. Unlike most other Texans, however, I prefer my tea unsweetened most of the time. So, the Lipton was a little too sweet for my taste. Even knowing that it was honey flavored, I didn't expect it to be as sweet as it is. As a comparison, I like the Lipton Citrus Green Tea in bottles, but it is right on the edge. This was maybe twice as sweet. However, the mango flavor was excellent. Over ice, this tea was great.
Wow way too salty for my taste. They really need to cut back on it or just do it natural without salt.

These lollipops are delicious, especially the tooberry blueberry ones....they are all organic and made from natural fruits and fruit colors and taste like berries...just absolutely delicious!  And healthy!

It does indeed remind me of coconut cream pie. Tastes decadent but is far better for you than coconut cream pie ;)
I have tried all the LaraBar flavors and this is my favorite. Definitely worth a try.

Summary: I wish I could actually drink this stuff--it is impossible to palate.
Text:
I've tried on 3 separate occasions to down this stuff and literally vomitted this and everything else I'd had all day up within minutes of drinking this.
I can't believe ANYONE can find this even doable--It tastes like dirt and burns going down-never experienced anything this revolting in my life and I had such high hopes for this product.
On another note, I tried the chocolate and orange creamsicle of Amazing Grass Superfood and I gotta say-night and day difference, no problems drinking either one of those.
I hate that I bought the bigger can of this wheatgrass powder and now I can't even return it.
Great tasting coffee for a Colombian Dark Roast. It has a strong, but mellow taste and is a excellent value if you order on Amazon's auto ship program.

Summary: Water that's healthier than regular water? Maybe so.
Text:
A friend of mine who is following an alkaline diet recommended Essentia water because of the higher pH level, so I gave it a try. My usual water selection is either filtered water with Brita system or store-brand bottled water (mostly Perrier). I compared the taste of Essentia water with my usual waters and found Essentia to be somewhat silky, but nothing really outstanding. I like the fact, however, that it provides some health benefit by alkalizing the body's pH balance.

For those who don't know, alkaline diets emphasize eating fruits and vegetables, along with proper hydration, and are purported to lead to lower rates of cancer and disease. There is also some evidence that it lowers the risk for kidney stones and might slow bone loss and muscle degeneration, increase growth hormones, and even ease low back pain.

I researched what is the pH for other popular water and found a test result from a website. I don't know if the small difference in numbers makes big difference in one's body, but since I drink almost a liter of water every day, hopefully there is:

Brand: Source or Feature: pH
Essentia: Micro-clustered Water: 8.57
Aqua Hydrate: Utah purified water with minerals added: 7.96
Evian, France: Spring water: 7.53
Dasani: Purified tap water: 7.2
Volvic: Natural volcanic mineral water: 7.07
Arrowhead Spring water: USA Spring Water: 6.83
Penta Water: Micro-ionized: 6.7
Fiji Water, Fiji: Spring water: 6.65
Deer Park, Maryland: Spring Water: 6.31
Perrier Water: Processed water with minerals France: 5.28

As for Brita pH balance, I found that Brita purposely decreases water hardness to improve the taste of drinking water. As a result, the pH value of Brita filtered water tends to be in the slightly acid range.

With the benefit of Essentia water, its reasonable price and convenience, I will most probably switch Brita system to Essentia water.

This dry food is just that. It's a dry kibble. Considering the need for us pet parents to be conscientious about the food we feed our fur kids, this is a high quality food that is packed with protein and has no junk chemicals, fillers and what not. I take my cat to an all cat clinic. The vets highly recommend Innova Evo. My cat has no elimination problem. She has been eating Innova Evo for the last 4 years.

Summary: Good, healthy and protein filled snack.
Text: I only have one major issue. Because of the texture of jerky in general it really gets stuck in your teeth and becomes a bit of a chore to eat.
Have bought this product since '90s and always a winner. Product always fresh and presented creatively. A+ in quality and reliability

Summary: cookies great....but too many broken ones
Text: I love the cookies and have for years. But this shipment came with too many broken ones.

I picked up a can of the sugar free Rock Star today. I was dying of thirst so when I opened it, I took a big chug of it. About halfway through swallowing it, the taste hit me, and I wanted to spit it all back out right away!

WHAT! THE! What *is* that disgusting taste? It was like chewing a big wad of Hubba Bubba, then drinking some nasty strawberry soda mixed with Code Red Mountain Dew and a baby aspirin all at once. After the first drink, I was still thirsty so I braved another swallow and I ended up just opening the car door and dumping the whole can out right then and there. It made me GAG trying to choke this hideous concoction down! What a waste of money.

I'm not a fan of energy drinks to begin with, but I've never !!IN MY LIFE!! tasted one this gross. It even smelled like CAT PEE.
My family loves this gum because not only does it taste good but it's good for you.

Summary: BEST TASTING BABY FOOD FOR AN ADULT !!!!!!!!!!
Text:
Due to some health complications my system is getting re-wired, doctors have me on baby food. Like a baby I am too start with single ingredient purees to easily identify any reactions. The past two weeks has been hell. Had forgotten just how horrible baby food was.. Just couldn't get myself go past the offensive stale odor that burst out upon opening the pouch.. A nurse at the hospital told me to try the frozen baby food option.. I picked Yummy Spoonfuls because it was one of the few that had a good variety of the single meals and boy am I glad I did!

Here is what I have tried so far..
The apple sauce: Never tasted apple sauce like this before.. it taste so light, clean and refreshing.. it taste like I took a bite directly from an apple only I didn't have to chew.

The Peas: The color of the peas is so vibrantly green you can tell it wasn't over cooked...it gave me the courage to dig in and I love it.. taste just like steamed peas.

Sweet potato: so cream, thick and sweet.

Butternut squash.. Taste amazingly light....has never been my favorite food but I am loving it...

Thank you for making such an amazing product... I am on baby food for the next 6 months.. I still cannot believe it is baby food.... You guys have completely changed my perception about baby food.. it is not all baby food that taste bad.. Thanks again for helping me during this difficult time in my life.. Please send flyers with my next order....I will pass them out at the hospital...

From an adult taste bud point of view, this is impeccable. It is no surprise that babies across the country love this food.

Be aware that you will not get what is in the picture, but what is in writing.  I called to verify what I would get if I placed an order for the food in the picture and was assured it would be cat food.  What came was a 34 pack of dog sausages as in the writing.  As soon as/if they change it, I will delete this reveiw.  Be aware.  Even though it was returned at amazon expense, it was still a pain in the neck.

Summary: Not bad but not Good enough to justify the price.
Text:
Not a bad candybar it tastes just fine, but I won't be giving up Hershey's or even Cadbury's Dark chocolate bars anytime soon.

What you are really paying for is the name & the opportunity to be politically correct. The candybar itself is half the size and more than twice the price of other dark choclate bars that are so similar in taste that the real bitter after-taste will be in your wallet. I would be more inclined to eat this more often if the pricing were more reasonable. Even if you are trying to do the right thing ecologically all the more reason you should not be punished by paying more for it.
We tried these on a whim a couple years back and were not disappointed!  They are very flavorful.  We have shared them with many people and they enjoy them, too!

I like strong coffee...I LOVE strong coffee and drink it black. This coffee is not really strong but it is quite bitter and has an odd taste to it. Reminds me of 8 o clock French Roast which I also do not like. If you like 8 o clock French Roast you will likely like this one. I like San Franciscos Fog Chaser much better and make it on the stongest setting of my brewer.
It is nice to have something to take the edge off this product will do that.  thanks.
Nice light roasted coffee with no bitter aftertaste. If you'd like a nice smooth cup of Joe in the morning you will like this.

Like all K Paul items, it is wonderful! Does not leave the food soggy nor greasy, yet has a wonderful flavor
Ben Schwark

I started using this some time ago but recently, my local stores quit carrying it. So, I was pleased to find it on Amazon. This is a good Carolina style sauce that will make for something different at your next bbq.

Beautiful little plants that arrived in about 3 days. They were well packed and in good shape, considering the heat. Since it is very hot and dry, I have not planted them yet. They are being pampered in my house. I bought one of those watering rings so I can plant the rhododendrons and have water on them all the time.

arrived in record time and super condition.  I got two, one as a thank you gift, and now I wish I had a second for myself.  Like another reviewer, I'm not going for bonsai, so for now it's in what's euphamistically called a 5 gal pot (but it probably really 3) and will be transplanted to dirt later.  Thumbs up!

I tried this and I like it! I find it to be a refreshing drink. When I put a packet in a glass... I thought "Kool Aid"! But it didn't have an artificial taste. I was afraid that it'd be too sweet for my taste but it was not... actually, I found it to be a perfect substitute for diet cola that I sip while working or playing at my computer. Give it a try... I think you'll like this easy to mix beverage.

Summary: A Great Tea for the Tea Lover.
Text: Prince of Wales Tea is wonderful.  It has a wonderful flavor without being overpowering or bitter.  Its scent reminds one of the Golden Age of British culture.  That being said, it is strong and not a tea I would recomend for someone aprehensive about getting into tea.  Start them off on a more mild tea.  Other than that it is great.

These have a great crunch and it's great that it's low fat. However, it's way too salty. 280mg per serving is more than twice the amount of regular flavor chips like Lays. The cheddar and sour cream and onion flavor is delicious but also way too salty and too much sodium for my taste buds or health.

Not having had a lot of experience with oil cured olives I did not know what to expect.  My impressions is that these olives are a good value, but I found them too salty for my taste.  I actually ended up soaking them in fresh water (changed often) for several hours to remove some of the salt.  While this helped, I still found them leaving me feeling like I had just consumed a weeks worth of salt.  The olives themselves were usually firm, not hard and in a few cases somewhat soft.  If these where peaches I would describe them as free-stone, meaning the pit is easily removed from flesh.

Being of Italian heritage, I was enticed by the romantic notion of starting my day with some real Italian coffee... I use a stovetop espresso (moka) maker. I received the four pack of Lavazza Rossa bricks very quickly, but to my disappointment, the expiration date on the bricks was impossible to understand. I received the packs on May 20th, 2011 and the two different numbers on the bottom of the bag read "AP1610" and "30081Z" (yes, "Z"). So, either the bags were over a year past expiration, or "1Z" means 12. Not sure. Oh well, I thought, I'll give it a whirl... The coffee was not bad. But, it was no better than Safeway's own Franch Roast beans from the bin that I have been grinding myself for years. This coffee is not worth the extra money (or, was it expired?). I'm still irritated that the company would be so unclear about the expiration date. I won't order this product again. Spudoratos!

I'm really happy I tried this moisturizer, it is amazing. At first I didn't think 3oz of this stuff would be enough to last me very long but a little really goes a long way. My skin soaks it right in but you only need a little bit of it. I think I use less a dime-sized amount to cover my entire face. It's not greasy at all and just leaves your skin feeling incredibly soft. The first time I used it at night, I used it before going to bed and when I woke up the next morning, my face was noticeably clearer. It even helped diminish my pimples.

I have been a fan of Celestial Seasonings products for many years. I have tried many of Celestial Seasonings teas and this one is one of my favorites.

I like this tea both hot and cold. As a hot tea the honey chamomile blends into a very soothing drink. I enjoy honey chamomile on cold evenings or when I have had a hard day. I keep the pot on and have several cups while I relax.

As a cold tea it is refreshing yet soothing. It is a great drink to sip during conversations or when reading a good book.

This is a healthy product. The tea is caffeine free, contains no sugar or carbohydrates. It is sodium free and has zero calories.
Many Celestial Seasonings teas are herbal teas that are free of artificial ingredients. Finally, Celestial Seasonings teas comes in a box of six that is at least $2.75 cheaper than in the grocery store.

I highly recommend Honey Vanilla Chamomile Tea

Summary: Love it!!!  Shiney fur and no "dog" smell!
Text:
We switched our dogs to this food after reading about what is in grocery store brands. I believe they were on Beneful. (garbage) The change was amazing! They have been on Orijens for around 3 yrs now and they are doing great! We have a bassett mix, and elderly lab mix, and a beagle. The changes in their fur were amazing! Their coats went from dull and dry to soft and shiney. We get comments all the time on how shiney and soft they are. Another nice effect is that since there is no corn in the food, our dogs do not smell at all anymore. Dogs cannot digest corn properly and thats why you get that "dorito" smell with the cheaper foods.
Our older lab mix's arthritis improved drastically and he has such a spring in his step for an old guy (13yrs.) I honestly believe Orijens has added years to his life. The beagle always had a touchy stomach too, and after the first 2 weeks or so he was doing better than ever on Orijens. They also all love it. It is so worth the price to me as my dogs are healthier and happier.

My wife and I prefer them just a bit stale - leave them open for a day or so to get just the right amount of chew. If you don't, they're very, very crisp (but still very good). Snappy, even. :)

I'll also agree with the comment that they can be inconsistent from one bag to the next, but even when they're off, they're pretty good.

As far as flavor goes, one person's spicy is another person's bland. For my family, they're just the right amount of hot after a few cookies.

the jerky was so tough i was only able to eat 1 out of ever 3 pieces. was a complete was of money. i'm very disappointed in the product. the only positive is that it is low sodium (either by make or by the fact that only a few pieces are edible)

I always stock a variety of items on my kitchen shelves that might be used as an instant lunch in times when I'm in a hurry and don't have any time to prepare things. One of my long-time favorites is the Maruchan Instant Lunch cups and I presently have the beef flavor. They also come in several other flavors. The cost is minimal. They're real easy to prepare real. Just peel back the top, add hot water and let it set for about three minutes. Have a few things like cheese, fruits, meat along with your noodle soup and, viola, an instant lunch. Works real well and is tasty. My only reservation is the very high salt (sodium) content. It's listed at 1,200mg, which is about 50% of the daily recommendation. In one serving! Wow! It's an easy and quick lunch, but you'd better watch your other salt intake.

Gary Peterson

Like another reviewer, I've sampled a number of the other Familia mueslis, and other granolas and mueslis at stores.

This is the superior muesli. (I'm eating some now to make sure I get this right...) I wouldn't think of myself as a muesli commentator, but this stuff is surprisingly good so I had to chime in.

It has a good selection of dried fruit and nuts, plus a bit of dried rice and corn flakes for texture. I wasn't particularly looking for low-fat but that's a bonus.

Very tasty to eat! I eat it with breakfast, and often as dessert after dinner.

Enjoy...

I have this item on automatic shipment receiving 3 boxes per month for our larger family. We all eat a GF/DF + diet. Because there are multiple food allergies in our family, grocery shopping can be a bit pricey. Amazon's prices allow us to buy the ingredients we need at a price that doesn't break the bank, and Bob's Red Mill provides the high quality products that provide consistent tasty results every time.

This Garbanzo Bean Flour is a high protein option for those who need to follow a gluten-free/wheat-free diet. For those who also have issues with most all grains, either allergen or blood-sugar issues, this flour allows you to have some of your favorite foods without causing your body harm. It's also a great way to add fiber to your diet, so it's great for everyone who'd like a little variety in their diet.

bacon sunflower seeds... sounds great, right? well i thought so too... but they put a little too much baconsalt on them, crazy right? but the paprika or whatever it is overpowers everything else & because of that i can only eat 3-4 seeds at atime.. big disappointment.

Bought this mix along with the Cuisinart waffle maker.  Delicious.  We followed the directions and it made only one Belgian waffle.  The next time we doubled the recipe and it came out the right amount.  Good flavor and easy to use.
This is the only decaffeinated tea, that tastes as good as regular tea.  It is divine and I love to start each day with at least one cup.
This is the best of the pink sea salts I've used.  Love it on eggs and as a finishing salt.  Because it's flaked, no need to grind to enjoy.

These are my favorite crackers! I'm just repeating other reviewers but they are more delicious than the original Clubs. They are more fragile (although I haven't received a box that contained more than the typical couple broken crackers). I don't know about the nutrition or real grain content, but I just buy them because they are the most delicious cracker I've had, including all the other major brands.

I highly recommend trying these. I mostly eat them plain, because aside from laziness and fragility, I just want to taste the cracker and it doesn't need topping.

Smooth. Very Smooth.

This English Breakfast Tea is very smooth, yet full-bodied. It doesn't have quite the bitter tannin punch I expected, considering I accidentally steeped it a bit too long. It still has a pretty robust tea flavor, just not as much bitterness I expected. This is a good thing.

Highly recommended. Surprisingly good even without sugar or cream.

I recently adopted Jake, a 3 yr old German Shepherd Mix from a GSD rescue organization and was excited to introduce him to a variety of new toys. Most he destroyed within minutes. The Busy Buddy Tug-a-Jug is his favorite toy and keeps him challenged and entertained for long periods of time, while other toys get tossed aside. He has easily figured out how to maneuver the bottle to obtain the kibble inside and it's adorable to watch how excited he becomes when he wins the prize...each and every time.

I know that other reviewers have complained that it's difficult for the dog to get the food to come out. Perhaps the pieces are too large or the rope is not extended. Keeping the rope fully extended for him, Jake is able to retrieve the kibble...not with complete ease...but with a little effort and determination. I would highly recommend this toy for a dog in need of a fun and durable toy that will keep him mentally stimulated.
If you enjoy a bold but mellow cup of coffee, then this is the one for you.  I enjoy Starbuck coffee but this is even better.

Bel Paese Cheese is an excellent soft Italian cream cheese.  These medallions arrived in excellent condition and were allowed to rest for a day under refrigeration.  The taste, while a bit bland, was very good and was spreadable on water wafer crackers.  The ordering process through Amazon.com was a troubling and difficult to complete, but the shipping was relatively quick.  I would recommend this product.

A five-ounce jar contained about 12-15 olives.  The olives were of good quality but certainly nothing to rave about.  The olives were, indeed, stuffed with a white pasty substance that the label claimed was bleu cheese.  It was grainy and crumbly in the mouth and had none of the classic bleu cheese flavor.  A great olive stuffed with great bleu cheese can be a transforming taste experience; these olives are common olives stuffed with nothing special and do not belong in my cupboard.  I'm sorry I tried them, but it won't stop me from enjoying the great olives where they can be found.
Came in record time, tastes grea--especially with a bit of Tanzanian Tea Masala spice mix and a dab of milk/cream.  Best thing...no caffeine.
I love these.  I found them at a discount store and would like to have more, and other flavors.  Crunchy, good stats/nutrition.  Delicious.

I use red clover tea a lot and so do my friends, it helps cure insomnia and is also known as a cleanser of the body organs. I feel rejuvenated, refreshed and cheerful after I use it, which is between once a week and once a month.

I have tried this brand's 'green onions' and their 'strawberries' before. They are great.
However, the mangoes I received were just 'nasty'. They had what can best be described as "musty-like" smell to them, and they did not taste like mango. Very disappointing! This is an expensive, risky purchase.
I also ordered the fruit mix, and because of this experience, and I am reluctant to try them yet :(

Popcornopolis Cheddar Popcorn through Amazon is just as good as if you bought it directly in the store.  The vacuum sealed bags keep the popcorn fresh.  Great price and fast shipping.  I highly recommend for cheese popcorn lovers.  It is the best I've tasted.

and I love buying it for her. Not only is it a healthy organic meal, I personally like what the Newman Foundation does with their profits (after taxes) from their products.....$265 MILLION has been donated to various charities to date by their foundation. I buy Newman's Own products whenever I can (their spaghetti sauce is out-of-this-world..."Roasted Garlic"...YUM!).

My dog has eaten this food for years and years until, out of the blue, my local grocer decided not to sell it anymore. I then had to grab a bag of food for her because we were out completely and decided to get Beneful. Apparently, her digestive system didn't like it and she ended up with bloody stools. That's when I came to Amazon.com (a GODSEND for people like me who have lame grocery stores to shop from) and found her Newman's Own dog food! I can always depend on Amazon.com. I've now got this on auto-delivery. I trust Newman's Own products and I know my dog is getting a well-balanced organic meal and it's Melamine-free.

Pamela's Pancake and waffle mix makes the best waffles, and scones and is gluten free. I had been buying this product from a local organic food store, but found that Amazon.com had a package of three for a substantial savings. I was sorry to have to give up so many products due to dietary constraints, but am very pleased to find this product which is very tasty, easy to use and fits my diet needs.
I got exactly what I anticipated I would.  My dogs start every single day with a Dogswell Happy Hips Chicken strip.

It is expensive, but its really good tuna. It is a hunk of tuna, not just tuna scraps injected into a can. If you are accustomed to eating Chicken of the sea or bumbble bee brands you might think this is dry in comparison, but those major brands of tuna are like hotdogs you don't know what is ground up and squirted into those cans. Rather than tasting the vegetable oil and god knows what else enjoy the taste of actual tuna.
They arrived in good condition and fresh. They taste great. I like them alot. They were packaged properly for the trip.

Unexpectedly good bang for the buck: who would think that they understand coffee in Minnesota, somewhat far from the growing regions (ok, Seattle too).
Hard to say much about good balanced product: rich, but not burned or bitter, easy on the stomach,
has caffeine, reminds Starbucks Breakfast Mild, will buy again.

I have never been a fan of regular pastas but my wife would eat pasta everyday and anyway it was fixed. She was diagnosed with celiac disease about 4 years ago so we needed to find a pasta that she could eat. After many trial and error processes we tried the Bionature pastas and they are wonderful. Even I enjoy this pasta, and we eat it at least twice a week.
It is more epensive that other gluten free pastas, but it is well worth the extra cost. I order the spaghetti, macaroni, fusilli, and the penne rigata by the case (6 or 12 pkgs.), and I have found no place cheaper than Amazon, especially with their free shipping. bionaturae Organic Penne Rigate, Gluten Free, 12-Ounce Bags (Pack of 6)bionaturae Organic Spaghetti, Gluten Free, 12-Ounce Bags (Pack of 6)bionaturae Organic Fusilli, Gluten Free, 12 Ounce Bags (Pack of 12)bionaturae Organic Elbow Pasta, Gluten Free, 12 Ounce Bags (Pack of 12)

Summary: Nice but it's a weak dark roast
Text: This was a good decaf but didn't live up to my high expections based on the labeling. I got this hoping for a rich dark roast but it was on the weaker side.  I'm still looking for a rich dark roast DECAF.
I order this 10 pound box of jelly bellys and they came very quickly.  The  box is heavy and the jelly bellys were perfect.  If you are a cinnamon jelly belly fan this box is for you!
I really liked ... It melted will mailed! I still really like the wizard cards... I have snape and harry's family!
The dog really loved these bones and it seemed to freshen her breath.  It was a good treat for a dog with tummy troubles.
These are the best macadameia clusters.  They have lots of nuts and the salted caramel is terrific.  We couldn't find them locally, so we were glad to find them on Amazon.

These are the best ginger snaps we've ever had...gluten free or not!  Very crispy, robust ginger taste and enough clove spice to know what's in the cookie.  All 6 packages arrived uncrushed.  We haven't found a broken cookie yet.  My husband is a meat and potato kind of guy, so gluten free food is torture for him.  These?  He says they are fantastic and place another order quick!
These guys rock! Nice refreshing drink with a little extra kick to help you wind down.I will reorder! Thanks again Mood and Mind!

Summary: My puppy loves it and I love that is lasts a long time
Text:
This is a great chew product. The particular shape seems to appeal to my dog. He plays with it - doesn't just chew it - so he has more fun. It is lasting a long time. I have an 8 month old terrier/ pit bull/ not sure what else mix. He is an "aggressive chewer". This is worth the cost if your aggressive chewer needs an outlet!

As a bonus - it is latex-free and good for their dental health.
I didn't realize there was sugar in the Stevia until it came.  It tastes really good, but I didn't want the sugar.

Just received the pack of ginger snaps today. It sure made the sun shine on a rainy day. My wife and I both had two a piece and both stood looking at one another shaking our heads. The ginger taste is wonderful and the only part I did'nt like too well was they are fairly hard, although for me I like softer cookies. I can take good care of that problem with a little dunk in my coffee and then I also have a spiced coffee. All in all a very good taste and a great cookie

Summary: Fantastic Coconut water! The best out there!
Text: I've tried practically every type of coconut water on the market, and Taste Nirvana has the best! It tastes just like the water from a fresh young coconut. I drink about 2 cans a day, so I am glad that Amazon can help me keep my fridge stocked. This product is so delicious. My friends noticed that I drink it all the time, and now they're addicted too! Taste Nirvana offers an exceptional product from a company run by wonderful people!
I was buying these from a local Costco and they stopped carrying them.  Thank God for Amazon.  I loved them with chicken salad, tuna salad and various cheeses and spreads.

I found Yogi Tea at the local grocery store & from then on we began an amazing love affair! (shhh, don't tell my husband!) I love all their teas & this Stomach Ease one is perfect for those times when I'm not feeling so hot "south of the belly-button" ;o) (my kids even love it!)

Muir Glen has the best quality tomato products on the market. They are a bit more expensive than the cheap brands at the grocery stores, but well worth the difference. Since I "subscribe" to regular shipments from Amazon, it is cheaper to have Muir Glen products delivered to my door, than what it costs to buy Muir Glen at the grocery stores. Not many stores carry Muir Glen anyhow, so buying through Amazon is, by far, the best way to get these delicious tomato products.
I had a hard time finding organic Rosemary powder since most companies don't have it as a fine powder. This was excellent.

This excellent tea is an Earl Grey. Capt. Picard drinks Earl Grey. If Picard drinks it, I drink it; that should be sufficient to get my point across. But for those of you who don't recognize the reference I'll say that I'm very pleased that my lady friend in Stash's hometown turned me on to this. I have a few cups every day, usually with some toast and almond butter. If you find typical tea like Lipton to be a bore or want to lay off the coffee for a while, try some of this and be pleasantly surprised.
Did what they said, good price and showed up early. I buy this item regularly and this was the best service I have had. Will reMember next time

We know a lot about GF producs in my house and my son really likes these cookies.  They are good Oreo substitutes.  The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is because the cookie part is very hard and brittle.

Summary: Yes, this is a full case
Text: Since some of the descriptions at Amazon conflict with what the seller actually sends you, I wanted to confirm that my S&S order from Amazon did contain 12 cans. Tomato puree of any sort isn't sold in the stores near where I now live, so while I miss Progresso products, Cento is a decent substitute.
This item came very fast! And my French Bulldog ate this stuff even faster!Great product, great price, fast shipping. I recommend this to all dog lovers for a healthy dog treat!

Summary: It was ok for the time being
Text: I use hibiscus as a hair conditioner. I purchased the product because the place where I normally get it from was out of stock. The product was an ok stand in but this is not pure hibiscus... its mixed with silicon dioxide (a noticeable amount of it). This made it hard to wash out of my hair. The hibiscus in the product had a good stain quality and still conditioned my hair.
I have ordered Breakfast Blend over the last three years.  The last order I received through Amazon was just awful! Bitter, burnt, undrinkable.....what are they doing to my once favorite coffee??

I found this hot sauce while shopping in old town St. Augustine Florida. The store was filled with Sauces of every kind. I asked the woman working there for her favorite and she instantly led me to the-Made in Florida-Gator Hammock.  Now I order by the case. I can not be without... seriously.  It is a sauce with a full and unique flavor. Delicious. I have also purchased their other flavors. Lethal Hammock -wonderfully Really Hot. Swamp Gator medium heat and of course Gator which is mild but hot. Their sprinkles are great too, in chili and stir fry. Worth a try. If you love hot sauce, this will become your favorite.

This spice is delicious and the size of the container makes it a great deal.  Mix 1 tablespoon chili powder, 1 tablespoon brown sugar and 1 teaspoon or more of salt in a bowl.  Sift the mixture after mixing onto a plate.  Coat pork chops or chicken breasts with the mixture, by just laying the meat on the plate and flipping over.  Grill the meat on both sides until cooked.
